data.eml:eml: A new side-necked turtle (Pleurodira, Pelomedusoides) from the Santana Formation (Early Cretaceous), Araripe Basin, Northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Gustavo Ribeiro De, Kellner, Alexander Wilhelm Armin (2007): A new side-necked turtle (Pleurodira, Pelomedusoides) from the Santana Formation (Early Cretaceous), Araripe Basin, Northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 1425: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175708
